CustomField.description: Numerical value to determine an Opportunity's stage for validation
CustomField.formula: CASE (StageName , "Stage 0 - Initial Qualification", 1, "Stage 1 - Sales Accepted Opportunity", 2, "Stage 2 - Discovery", 3, "Stage 3 - Tech Validation", 4, "Stage 4 - Business Validation", 5, "Stage 5 - Negotiation & Contracts", 6, "Stage 6 - Closed Pending", 7, "Closed Won", 8, "Closed Lost", 8, "Qualified Out", 8, 0 )
CustomField.label: Stage Value
